title: Ecommerce and lending platform
description: Today SMBs in India face a lot of problems like an aggressive promotional strategy from big eCommerce, lending, fraud detection,  SCM, etc
solution: A decentralized eCommerce platform that will tackle issues based on consensus & transparency. A platform for the SMBs by the SMBs.
experience: I have zero experience in ecommerce industry but I have good amount understanding and problems faced by businesses.
